justification: The fields `consumerStartTimestamp`, `rpcHook`, `serviceState`, and others found in both DefaultLitePullConsumerImpl.java and DefaultMQPushConsumerImpl.java classes represent details related to consumer configuration and state. These fields clearly belong to a common domain, namely the domain of the consumer client configuration, and should be grouped together in a dedicated class to encapsulate data and behavior associated with the consumer client setup.
